text: When a person combs his hair, static electricity is sometimes generated by what process?

options.a: Contact between the comb and hair results in a charge
options.b: Friction between the comb and hair results in the transfer of electrons
options.c: Conduction between the comb and hair
options.d: Induction between the comb and hair

hint: while combing hair, friction between the comb and the hair results is the transfer of electrons.
